backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, game CRUD operations with creator/admin authorization, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including global styles with webkit prefixes, routing setup, chat interface with AI response generation, media generation with photorealistic Canvas API rendering, translation, music, art, code, and games features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Card, PWA manifest, JSON-LD structured data, and Apple-specific meta tags for iOS Safari compatibility.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme OKLCH colors, tabbed navigation interface, sticky header, and animated content transitions using Inter and Poppins fonts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata with standalone display mode, black theme, and icon configurations for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing nine URLs (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and weekly change frequency for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for all features (chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games), and wraps the app with theme and identity providers.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, and features for saving/sharing artwork plus an AI art idea generator chat interface.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Main chat page layout that combines ChatSidebar and ChatView components, handles session selection and navigation, with a collapsible sidebar and close button.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection functionality using the useChatSessions hook.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat conversation view displaying messages with user/assistant avatars, textarea input with send button, typing indicators, and auto-scrolling message history.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a styled error card, showing error details and providing reset/reload options.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games. Supports game deletion for owners and launches GamePlayer when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders an individual game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and click handlers.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog presenting three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Used for initial game mode selection.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Iframe-based game player that loads game code, handles scoring via postMessage, tracks high scores, and includes fullscreen support. Contains embedded templates for Snake and Flappy Bird games.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Form-based game creation interface where authenticated users can input title, description, and HTML/CSS/JS code to create and save new games to the backend.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Main games section router that manages view modes (menu/predefined/browse/create/playing) and coordinates navigation between GameBrowser, GameStudio, PredefinedGameSelector, and GamePlayer components.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, theme toggle, home navigation, and authentication controls (sign out button, user profile display). Sticky positioned with backdrop blur.
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component that displays a grid of navigation cards for different AI tools (Math Solver, Chat, Translator, Code, Music, Art, Media, Games), each with icons, descriptions, and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component with difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, homework helper mode with chat-like interface, and client-side expression evaluation with step-by-step solutions.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Media search interface with tabs for images and videos, featuring auto-search with debouncing, image download functionality, video preview dialogs, and integration with custom image/video search hooks.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component supporting AI-generated audio from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with kick/snare/hihat sounds, tempo control, playback controls, and music sharing functionality with URL generation.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Dialog component that displays a grid of predefined classic games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) with emojis and descriptions, allowing users to select and launch games.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for a name and saves user profile data (name, gamesPlayed, totalScore) using a custom hook, with non-dismissible behavior.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component that provides a chat-based script/code generator interface with message history, code copying functionality, and keyboard shortcuts for sending prompts.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Component for viewing shared artwork or music content via URL parameters, displaying loading states, error handling, and rendering images or audio players based on content type.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation interface component supporting 12 languages with source/target language selection, translation history display, and keyboard shortcuts for quick translation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing Internet Computer actor creation with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated actors, and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook providing AI art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food), returning randomized creative prompts for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork by generating unique IDs and share URLs, though backend artwork persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on prompt characteristics and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs for playback and storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, erasing, color/brush size control, and canvas clearing with white background initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions in localStorage with mock AI response generation that provides contextual replies for greetings, math, science, and other educational topics based on conversation history.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on games including fetching all games, single game by ID, creating, and deleting games via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with React Query hooks for retrieving and updating scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageSearch.ts: Implements free image search using Unsplash Source API without authentication, fetching 12 varied images per query using different random seeds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Analyzes text prompts to extract visual attributes (colors, shapes, subjects, actions, styles) and manages state for generated images and videos with detailed prompt parsing for human, animal, object, and scene characteristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Provides music sharing functionality with local ID generation and clipboard URL copying; backend persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Custom React hook that manages script generation with mock AI responses, providing message history, loading states, and template-based code generation for React, Python, JavaScript, API, and calculator examples.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content that intentionally throw errors since backend no longer supports these features.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook providing mock translation functionality with support for multiple languages, translation history, and common phrase detection for greetings and thanks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the actor backend, with toast notifications and cache invalidation on successful saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSearch.ts: Custom hook providing video search functionality with a curated database of free sample videos organized by categories (nature, animals, technology, sports, etc.) and keyword-based search matching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark theme with teal primary colors, coral accents, sidebar styling, and webkit-specific compatibility prefixes for Safari.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names with proper conflict resolution.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Complete HTML template for a Flappy Bird game implementation with canvas rendering, sprite images, collision detection, scoring system, and game over screen.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Error logging utility class that captures errors with severity levels (info, warning, error, critical), maintains a rolling log buffer, and outputs to console with appropriate log levels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended utilities for borders/shadows, and custom animations for accordions and slides.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file indicating a chat application with AI capabilities, pending feature requests for chat functionality restoration, and a known deployment failure in version 46.
